description: Light, comfortable and packable trekking trousers for warm climates – these Abisko Hike Trousers M are made from G-1000 Air Stretch with recycled polyester and organic cotton. They have a tapered fit, integrated belt for adjusting the waist, and ventilation openings on the sides – for warm-weather trekking optimisation. Two zippered hand pockets, zippered pocket on the right leg, and leg endings with drawcord adjustments.
name: Fjallraven Abisko Hike Trousers, Short - Mens
